name: Mr. Sprinkle
description: West Coast's premier custom grillz specialist since 2002. Serving Reno/Nevada, San Francisco Bay Area/California, and Seattle/Washington with medical-grade dental gold grillz, diamond settings, and custom tooth jewelry. 0% tarnish guarantee.

expertise.description: Expert craftsmanship in custom gold and diamond grillz since 2002. Operating across Reno/Nevada, San Francisco Bay Area/California, and Seattle/Washington. Specializing in medical-grade dental gold (10K, 14K, 18K), sterling silver, and precious stone settings.
Medical-grade dental gold grillz with 0% tarnish guarantee. 14K dental gold is our most popular material - hypoallergenic, safe, and long-lasting. Available across Nevada, California, and Washington.
Custom diamond settings in grillz. Expert in fully iced designs, accent stones, and custom patterns. Serving West Coast clients.
Affordable sterling silver grillz starting at $80 per tooth. Perfect entry point for first-time grillz customers across all service areas.
Specialized dental jewelry including gap fillers and custom fangs in all sizes (Small, Medium, Long, XL-Curved) and materials. Available in all West Coast locations.

Professional dental mold services across West Coast. Reno locations: Jack of All Fades (Mondays), Global Goods Shop (Saturdays). Bay Area and Seattle: Mobile service available. Text to schedule: (530) 214-0676

faq.question: What materials do you use for grillz?
faq.answer: We use medical-grade dental gold (10K, 14K, 18K), sterling silver, white gold, and platinum. 14K dental gold is our most popular - it's hypoallergenic, safe for your mouth, and has a 0% tarnish guarantee.

faq.question: How much do custom grillz cost?
faq.answer: Silver grillz start at $80 per tooth, 10K gold at $200 per tooth, and 14K dental gold at $310 per tooth. Gap fillers and fangs range from $10-$70 depending on size and material.

faq.question: Do gold grillz tarnish?
faq.answer: Our dental gold has a 0% tarnish guarantee. Silver may tarnish over time but can be easily cleaned. We provide care instructions with every order.

faq.question: How long does it take to get custom grillz?
faq.answer: Standard orders take 2-3 weeks. Rush delivery ($150 extra) saves 4+ days on your order.

faq.question: Where can I get my mold done?
faq.answer: Reno: Jack of All Fades (Mondays) and Global Goods Shop (Saturdays). Bay Area & Seattle: Mobile service available by appointment. Text (530) 214-0676 to schedule in any location.

faq.question: Do you serve the Bay Area and Seattle?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer mobile grillz services throughout the San Francisco Bay Area and Seattle metro area. Text (530) 214-0676 to schedule your appointment.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept Cash, Zelle, Venmo, CashApp, and PayPal. Online payment methods have small transaction fees.
